oml:task_type.oml:name: Supervised Classification
oml:task_type.oml:description: Given a dataset with a classification target and a set of train/test splits, e.g. generated by a cross-validation procedure, train a model and return the predictions of that model.
oml:task_type.oml:author: Joaquin Vanschoren

oml:input.oml:name: estimation_procedure
oml:input.oml:description: The method to estimate the quality of the built model.

oml:parameter.oml:name: number_repeats
oml:parameter.oml:description: Number of times the evaluation is repeated (with different random initializations)

oml:parameter.oml:name: number_folds
oml:parameter.oml:description: Number of folds within each repetition. Typically 1, except when cross-validation is used.

oml:parameter.oml:name: stratified_sampling
oml:parameter.oml:description: Determains whether the folds will be stratified.

oml:output.oml:name: predictions
oml:output.oml:description: The predictions built by the generated model.
